mapper.select: select r.faq_num, count(*) as counter from mwfaqboard b left outer join mwfaqreply r on b.faq_num = r.faq_num group by r.faq_num order by r.faq_num
mapper.insert: insert into mwfaqreply values( mwfaqreply_seq.nextval, #{faq_num}, #{id}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from mwfaqreply where faq_num=#{faq_num} order by num asc
mapper.delete: delete from mwfaqreply where num=#{num} and id=#{id}
